Cracked mud, Mesquite Dunes, IV



I was especially intrigued by the way the cracking here occurred on several different size scales simultaneously.
Taken Tuesday, March 30, 2004, 04:18:14pm.  Original image size: 3072x2048, 7.3Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/250s @ F11.0, ISO 100, 70-200mm/F2.8 @ 70mm (112mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 5200:10, 0.5:30:50:65:3:25:0
